subject: Issue with order
description_text:
When I try to track my order it says that it was already delivered, but it wasn't delivered.
[cid:4a2b0bdd-09fb-4839-ab61-2ca60301aecb]

conversations.body_text: Hi Leonardo Kurtz,  I sincerely apologize for the delayed response.Due to the New Year holiday and the subsequent surge in orders, a significant backlog of unprocessed emails has resulted in delayed responses. We extend our deepest apologies once again.  ​​I checked that your order was delivered on December 26th. Could you confirm if you haven't received it? If you confirm, I will help you verify it as soon as possible.
